sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card flat color="transparent" class="my-3">
    <v-card-title class="custom-title text-center mb-5 text-break"
      >Formulaire de contact</v-card-title
    >
    <v-form v-model="isValid" class="d-flex flex-column justift-space-around">
      <v-text-field
        v-model="form.data.email"
        :rules="form.rules.email"
        placeholder="Votre email"
        required
      ></v-text-field>
      <v-text-field
        v-model="form.data.phone"
        :rules="form.rules.phone"
        placeholder="Votre numéro de téléphone"
      ></v-text-field>
      <v-textarea
        v-model="form.data.message"
        :rules="form.rules.message"
        placeholder="Votre demande"
        required
      ></v-textarea
      ><v-btn
        class="mt-8"
        tile
        color="success"
        @click="sendForm"
        :disabled="!isValid"
      >
        <v-icon left>
          mdi-pencil
        </v-icon>
        Edit
      </v-btn></v-form
    >
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "ContactForm",
  props: {
    data: Object
  },
  data() {
    return {
      isValid: false,
      form: {
        data: {
          email: "",
          phone: "",
          message: ""
        },
        rules: {
          email: [
            v => !!v || "E-mail is required",
            v => /.+@.+\..+/.test(v) || "E-mail must be valid"
          ],
          phone: [
            v => !!v || "Phone is required",
            v =>
              /(^0[0-9]{9}$)|(^0[0-9]( [0-9]{2}){4}$)/.test(v) ||
              "Phone must be a valid phone"
          ],
          message: [
            v => !!v || "Message is required",
            v =>
              (v && 20 <= v.length) ||
              "Message must be less than 20 characters",
            v =>
              (v && v.length <= 500) ||
              "Message must be less than 500 characters"
          ]
        }
      }
    };
  },
  methods: {
    sendForm() {
      console.log("sent", this.isValid);
    }
  }
};
</script>
